House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01222
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING POWER INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECTS AS PROJECTS OF NATIONAL SIGNIFICANCE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE CERTAIN PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED 9136, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "ELECTRIC POWER INDUSTRY REFORM ACT OF 2001," AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : UMALI, REYNALDO V.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Uybarreta (000 2018-02-05)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-30
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-08-08
      3. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-12-04
      4. Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2018-02-01
          -The TWG deliberation was terminated pending submissions of the following: (1) stakeholders to submit in legislative language their suggestions to input into the final version of the bill within five (5) working days; (2) stakeholders to provide in writing the manner in setting RPT in areas where energy projects of national importance is identified; (3) DOE to provide the committee with a list of projects duly considered as projects of national significance based on the requirements set forth under E.O. 30; and (4) provision to be provided for ERC to follow a timeline within which to approve power service agreement.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2016-08-01
